Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 18 Piercing plus 5 Lightning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 16 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its bite and two with its claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Lightning Breath, The Dragon exhales lightning in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 66 Lightning damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 14 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: Part of the ceiling collapses above one creature that the Dragon can see.  The creature makes a Dexterity saving throw or take an Average 10 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone and buried
Lair Actions.Action 2: A cloud of sand swirls about, blinding creatures caught in the sphere
Lair Actions.Action 3: Lightning arcs, forming a line between two solid surfaces that the Dragon can see.  Creatures caught when the line forms make a Dexterity saving throw or take an Average 10 Lightning damage
